house_listing.house_description: Bayfront living at its best!Gated community w/private 2 car garages & spacious floor plans w/luxury upgrades already included!Amenities include the magnificient bay club for social events,pool,exercise studio,private sundeck & board walk.Lovely european style village green park is a must see!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Club House, Elevator, Fenced,Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Intercom System, Microwave, OutsideSprinkler System, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
